A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No Character development\, poor plot. The vast majority of the movie is about a band of Rebel Starships being chased by a First Order fleet of ships at sub-light speed. The First Order could have simply hyperspace other ships into the Rebels path -end of story. Leftist agenda pushed into a sub plot that added nothing to the film. When Rey meets emasculated Luke\, its a major let down. Worst film of the whole franchise. Left the theater very disappointed!
